channel.title: NPCHandler Help
channel.description:
I inserted this in my autospawn to make 2 mimes appear, and i set it up so theyd say when im online/offline [code]spawn = 1056 3254 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 Mime/ says im online spawn = 1056 3252 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 Mime/says im online[/code]
ok so i already put the stuff in so it would say it, i compiled it, with no errors, and then i went to runserver.bat nad got this error [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1056 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:796) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 at server.main(server.java:26)[/code] All i noe is that 1056 is the mime npc code, but idk wat the rest of the errors/w/e they are mean

item.title: NPCHandler Help
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

Ok, now, i ripped out the part that was supposed to make the NPC’s talk in playerHandler.java, and now i can log in, no errors, and i can see the mimes. Now does any1 have code for me to use em to make em say wen im off/online…im usin testscape source.

Read full topic

item.title: NPCHandler Help
item.dc:creator: @mitchtheblonde mitchtheblonde
item.description:
@mitchtheblonde wrote:

aw man. Now…it says it runs fine, but wen i logged in it gave me this error message

mitch has signed onto server. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.writeString(stream.java:232) at NPC.appendNPCUpdateBlock(NPC.java:79) at Player.addNewNPC(Player.java:589) at PlayerHandler.updateNPC(PlayerHandler.java:244) at client.initialize(client.java:12269) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:188) at server.main(server.java:45)

Read full topic

hm sounds reasonable lemme see if thats it
[br][size=1]Posted on: April 08, 2007, 08:58:02 AM[/size][hr]o wow mad props to u it runs now tyvm man ur the best…i would have never noticed that…id give u rep but i cant lmfao

item.title: NPCHandler Help

item.description:

I inserted this in my autospawn to make 2 mimes appear, and i set it up so theyd say when im online/offline

spawn = 1056 3254 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 Mime/ says im online spawn = 1056 3252 3430 0 0 0 0 0 1 Mime/says im online

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "1056 " at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:796) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) Starting TestScape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 at server.main(server.java:26)
